Accueil.p1: I design modern, user-centered applications. Curious and rigorous, I adapt to technological changes to offer relevant solutions.

About.title: About
About.p1: I design and develop end-to-end web applications, combining modern and intuitive interfaces with robust and secure backend architectures.
About.p2: From UX/UI design to API development and database optimization, each project is designed to provide a smooth, fast, and device-adapted experience.

list.title: Interactive Learning Platform
list.description: Educational web application allowing teachers to create courses, groups, and questions. Students can track their progress and acquire skills. Technologies: React, Laravel API.

list.title: DHCos E-commerce Site
list.description: Online store dedicated to natural cosmetics, built with Odoo.

list.title: Game Math Educational Game
list.description: Educational game to strengthen children's math skills. Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript.
